title: Textile
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: damassse (7&1 satin and a weft oriented 4 shaft float weave in which warps are paired)
dimensions:
Warp: 183.cm (72 in. ) Weft: (2 selvedge to selvedge widths sewn together): 89cm (35 in.) Selvedge to selvedge width: 45 cm (17 3/4in.)
Pattern: Repeat unit: warp; 22 cm (8 5/8in). weft; 7cm (2 3/4in.) Six repeat units fill the fabric width.
description: Vertically symmetrical pattern of offset plant motifs set in an ogee grid. Background; red-purple. Pattern; dull blue.
